tasks.name: Write Website Specification
tasks.des: Create a comprehensive specification document

checklist.name: Gather requirements from stakeholders
Define the target audience and user personas
Outline the website structure and navigation
Specify the visual design and branding guidelines

comments.title: Regularly update the specification as requirements evolve or change

evaluate.content: Did exactly as requested but still some errors

tasks.name: Create migration
tasks.des: Generate and implement database migration

checklist.name: Design the user authentication process
Implement user registration and login functionality
Set up user roles and permissions
Implement access control mechanisms

comments.title: Ensure secure storage and handling of user credentials

tasks.name: Implement authentication and authorization
tasks.des: Develop and integrate the authentication and authorization mechanisms to secure the system.

checklist.name: Design the user authentication process
Implement user registration and login functionality
Set up user roles and permissions
Implement access control mechanisms
Integrate authentication with external identity providers
Implement session management and logout functionality

comments.title: Consider using industry-standard authentication protocols like OAuth or OpenID Connect

tasks.name: Write unit test
tasks.des: Develop and implement unit tests to verify the functionality

checklist.name: Identify the components or units to be tested
Design test cases to cover different scenarios and edge cases

comments.title: Use a testing framework or library suitable for the programming language or technology stack

tasks.name: Deploy Config Servers for Production Deployments
tasks.des: Set up and configure the necessary configuration servers to support production

checklist.name: Select appropriate configuration server technology or tool
Install and set up the configuration server software
Configure the server to manage application configurations
Define and organize configuration files for different environments
Ensure secure storage and access to configuration data

comments.title: Consider using tools like Spring Cloud Config, HashiCorp Consul, or etcd

tasks.name: Build homepage UI and match API
tasks.des: Create homepage follows the design and match API

checklist.name: Implement HTML structure
Implement HTML structure
Add responsive design
Integrate interactive elements
Match API using axios

comments.title: Regularly update the specification as requirements evolve or change

tasks.name: Create wireframes
tasks.des: Create a visual design for the website interface using the Figma design tool

checklist.name: Gather design requirements and reference materials
Create wireframes and layout sketches
Design the visual elements such as typography, colors, and icons
Create interactive prototypes to demonstrate user interactions

comments: Explore design inspirations and trends to create a modern and appealing interface
Utilize Figma's collaborative features to enable real-time feedback and collaboration

tasks.name: create figma projct and import plugin
tasks.des: Set up Figma and install necessary plugins for design

checklist.name: Install Figma and set up the necessary workspace
Search and import necessarry component and libraries
Define palette, tyography

comments: Organize design files and components in Figma for easy navigation, version control, and reuse
Import and utilize helpful plugins in Figma to enhance the wireframing and design process

tasks.name: Create user persona
tasks.des: Create user personas to understand and represent the target users effectively

checklist.name: Conduct user research to gather insights on the target audience
Identify common characteristics and needs of the target users

comments: Consider demographics, motivations, and behaviors when creating user personas
Use qualitative and quantitative research methods to gather data for personas
